Prometheus is a desktop chatbot application designed to help you manage your tasks efficiently. With a clean and intuitive interface, you can easily add, track, and complete your to-dos, deadlines, and events.
Prometheus supports a variety of commands to manage your tasks.
To add a task without a specific date or time:
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 1 task in the list.
To add a task with a deadline:
The date/time can be in formats like `dd/MM/yyyy HHmm` or `yyyy-MM-dd`.
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 2 tasks in the list.
To add an event with a start and end time:
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 3 tasks in the list.
To see all the tasks you have added:
Here are the tasks in your list:
To mark a task as completed:
Nice! I've marked this task as done:
To change a task's status back to not done:
OK, I've marked this task as not done yet:
To remove a task from your list:
Now you have 2 tasks in the list.
To find tasks containing a specific keyword:
Here are the matching tasks in your list:
To set a priority level for a task:
1.  Ensure you have Java 11 or above installed.
2.  Download the latest `prometheus.jar` from the [releases page](https://github.com/Rihiz/ip)
3.  Run the application using the command: `java -jar prometheus.jar`
The application will automatically save your tasks to `data/prometheus.txt` in the same directory as the JAR file.

* - Deadline: Tasks with a completion deadline
* - Event: Tasks with start and end times

* Represents a command that can be executed by the Prometheus chatbot.
* Each command encapsulates a specific action to be performed on the task list,
* such as adding, deleting, or listing tasks.
* Commands are executed with access to the task list, user interface, and storage.
* This abstract class defines the structure for all concrete command implementations.

* @param storage The storage handler for saving tasks
* @throws PrometheusException If the command execution fails
public abstract void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws PrometheusException;

<StackPane prefHeight="600.0" prefWidth="400.0" styleClass="stack-pane" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/8.0.171" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="prometheus.gui.MainWindow" stylesheets="/css/main.css">
<AnchorPane styleClass="anchor-pane" maxHeight="1.7976931348623157E308" maxWidth="1.7976931348623157E308" minHeight="400.0" minWidth="300.0" prefHeight="600.0" prefWidth="400.0">
<VBox styleClass="vbox" spacing="8.0" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="0.0" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="0.0" AnchorPane.rightAnchor="0.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="0.0">
<TextField fx:id="userInput" onAction="#handleUserInput" promptText="Type your command here..." style="-fx-background-color: transparent;" HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS" />

<Button fx:id="sendButton" defaultButton="true" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#handleUserInput" style="-fx-background-color: #2196f3; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-background-radius: 4;" text="Send" />
